column1: luie ismael lopez| lopez luie ismael lopez
column3: of selma died jun. 15. he was a commissary worker for the fresno county sheriff's department. visitation: 8 a. m. to 9 a. m. jun. 22 at first united methodist church in selma. service: 9 a. m. jun. 22 at the church. graveside: 10:30 a. m. jun. 22 at floral memorial park in selma. a potluck reception will be held immediately following the graveside. arrangements: thomas-robinson funeral home .
